For the law project to be fully executed all function call have to be executed.","params":{"law_project":"Id of the law project the caller wants to add a proposition to. The Id is obtained by hashing the Title with the Description of the law project.","num_function_call_ToExecute":"Number of function calls to execute."}},"New_Election()":{"details":"When the current mandate duration is over or if the {New_Election_Petition_Rate} (see {Mandate} struct of {Delegation_Uils} library) is reached, any citizen can call this function to start a new election"},"Remove_Candidature()":{"details":"Function called by a citizen who wish to remove his candidature from next mandate's elections."},"Remove_Controled_Register(address)":{"details":"Function used to remove the control of a register contract from current delegation.","params":{"register_address":"Address of the register contract that isn't rulable anymore by current delegation"}},"Sign_New_Election_Petition()":{"details":"Function can be called by a citizen to sign petition for a new election"},"Start_Vote(bytes32)":{"details":"When the period of proposition submiting is over, any citizen can call this function to start the voting stage. The Id is obtained by hashing the Title with the Description of the law project."}},"Update_Internal_Governance(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint16,uint16,address)":{"details":"Change parameters related to the democratic process of Delegation's members election. ","params":{"Election_Duration":"Duration of the stage in which citizens are allowed to vote for Candidats they prefer","Immunity_Duration":"Amount of time after the beginning of a new mandate during which delegation's members can't be revoked","Ivote_address":"Address of the IVote contract that will be used during election stage","Mandate_Duration":"Duration of a delegation mandate","New_Election_Petition_Rate":"The minimum ratio of citizens required to revoke the current delegation's members and start a new election","Num_Max_Members":"Maximum number of members in the delegation.","Validation_Duration":"Duration of the stage in which citizens can validate their hased vote by revealing their choice and the salt that has been used for hasing "}},"Update_Legislatif_Process(uint256[6],uint16,uint16,address)":{"details":"Change parameters related to the democratic process of registers governance.  ","params":{"Censor_Penalty_Rate":"Ratio of total amount of token belonged by the delegation that will be lost if a law project is rejected by citizens","Censor_Proposition_Petition_Rate":"The minimum ratio of citizens required to cancel a law project","Ivote_address":"Address of the IVote contract that will be used during voting stage","Uint256_Legislatifs_Arg":"It's an array (We use an array to prevent the \"stack to deep error\") of uint256 arguments representing respectively:           - Member_Max_Token_Usage: The maximum amount of token a member is allowed to use for a law project elaboration          - Law_Initialisation_Price: The price in token for creating a law project          - FunctionCall_Price: The price in token for one FunctionCall.          - Proposition_Duration: The duration of the stage in which members are allowed to submit propositions          - Vote_Duration: The duration of the stage in which members are allowed to vote for the proposition they want          - Law_Censor_Period_Duration: The duration of the stage in which all citizens are allowed to sign a etition against the law project proposed by the Delegation   "}}},"version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{},"notice":"IDelegation is an interface for contracts that implement a governance system in which a group of elected accounts is allowed to rule one or more controled registers contract. documentation.text:
@notice IDelegation is an interface for contracts that implement a governance system in which a group of elected accounts is allowed to rule one or more controled registers contract. 
It allows to implement a repesentativ democracy system in which representatives (delegation members) mandate and decisions can be canceled via direct democracy.
Delegation.sol contract is an implementation of this interface.
By implementing this interface you can develop your own custom Delegations and plug them into a DAO project via the Constitution contract.

@dev Function used to add a register contract under the control of current delegation.
 
 @param register_address Address of the register contract that can now be ruled by current delegation

@dev Function used to remove the control of a register contract from current delegation.
 @param register_address Address of the register contract that isn't rulable anymore by current delegation
@dev Function called by a citizen who wish to candidate to next mandate's elections.
@dev Function called by a citizen who wish to remove his candidature from next mandate's elections.

@dev When the current mandate duration is over or if the {New_Election_Petition_Rate} (see {Mandate} struct of {Delegation_Uils} library) is reached, any citizen can call this function to start a new election
@dev Function can be called by a citizen to sign petition for a new election
@dev When voting stage is over, any citizen can call this function to end the election and start a new mandate.

@dev When the period of proposition submiting is over, any citizen can call this function to start the voting stage. The Id of the ballot corresponding to current law project the IVote contract is computed by hashing {law_project} Id with current block timestamps.
 @param law_project Id of the law project the caller wants to add a proposition to. The Id is obtained by hashing the Title with the Description of the law project.

@dev When the voting period is over, any citizen can call this function to end the voting stage. If the winning proposition is the default proposition is the default one (Proposition 0) the law proejct is aborted. Otherwise, the Law Censoring stage is started.
 @param law_project Id of the law project the caller wants to add a proposition to. The Id is obtained by hashing the Title with the Description of the law project.

@dev If we are at the Law censor stage, any citizen can call this function to sign the petition for canceling the law project. If the {Censor_Proposition_Petition_Rate} (see {Law_Project_Parameters} structure) is reached, the law project is aborted.
 @param law_project Id of the law project the caller wants to add a proposition to. The Id is obtained by hashing the Title with the Description of the law project.

@dev If the Law censor period is over and the law project hasn't been rejected by citizens, then any delegation member can call this function to set the law project as ADOPTED (see {Status} enumeration).
 @param law_project Id of the law project the caller wants to add a proposition to. The Id is obtained by hashing the Title with the Description of the law project.

@notice IDelegation is an interface for contracts that implement a governance system in which a group of elected accounts is allowed to rule one or more controled registers contract. 
It allows to implement a repesentativ democracy system in which representatives (delegation members) mandate and decisions can be canceled via direct democracy.
Delegation.sol contract is an implementation of this interface.
By implementing this interface you can develop your own custom Delegations and plug them into a DAO project via the Constitution contract.

@dev Function used to add a register contract under the control of current delegation.
 
 @param register_address Address of the register contract that can now be ruled by current delegation

@dev Function used to remove the control of a register contract from current delegation.
 @param register_address Address of the register contract that isn't rulable anymore by current delegation
@dev Function called by a citizen who wish to candidate to next mandate's elections.
@dev Function called by a citizen who wish to remove his candidature from next mandate's elections.

@dev When the current mandate duration is over or if the {New_Election_Petition_Rate} (see {Mandate} struct of {Delegation_Uils} library) is reached, any citizen can call this function to start a new election
@dev Function can be called by a citizen to sign petition for a new election
@dev When voting stage is over, any citizen can call this function to end the election and start a new mandate.

@dev When the period of proposition submiting is over, any citizen can call this function to start the voting stage. The Id of the ballot corresponding to current law project the IVote contract is computed by hashing {law_project} Id with current block timestamps.
 @param law_project Id of the law project the caller wants to add a proposition to. The Id is obtained by hashing the Title with the Description of the law project.

@dev When the voting period is over, any citizen can call this function to end the voting stage. If the winning proposition is the default proposition is the default one (Proposition 0) the law proejct is aborted. Otherwise, the Law Censoring stage is started.
 @param law_project Id of the law project the caller wants to add a proposition to. The Id is obtained by hashing the Title with the Description of the law project.

@dev If we are at the Law censor stage, any citizen can call this function to sign the petition for canceling the law project. If the {Censor_Proposition_Petition_Rate} (see {Law_Project_Parameters} structure) is reached, the law project is aborted.
 @param law_project Id of the law project the caller wants to add a proposition to. The Id is obtained by hashing the Title with the Description of the law project.

@dev If the Law censor period is over and the law project hasn't been rejected by citizens, then any delegation member can call this function to set the law project as ADOPTED (see {Status} enumeration).
 @param law_project Id of the law project the caller wants to add a proposition to. The Id is obtained by hashing the Title with the Description of the law project.

Achiev_Vote(bytes32).details: When the voting period is over, any citizen can call this function to end the voting stage. If the winning proposition is the default proposition is the default one (Proposition 0) the law proejct is aborted. Otherwise, the Law Censoring stage is started.

params.law_project: Id of the law project the caller wants to add a proposition to. The Id is obtained by hashing the Title with the Description of the law project.

Add_Controled_Register(address).details: Function used to add a register contract under the control of current delegation.

params.register_address: Address of the register contract that can now be ruled by current delegation

Add_Item(bytes32,uint256,bytes[],uint256.details: Function can be called by a delegation member to modify a proposition that he has already created (He have to be the author of the proposition).  Caller must approve {FunctionCall_Price} (see {Law_Project_Parameters} struct of {Delegation_Uils library})  multiplied by the number of function call he wants to add to the proposition, token for Delegation contract.

params.Indexs: array of Proposition's function call list indexs to inser new function call (contained in {New_Items}) to. {New_Items} and {Indexs} have the same length.
params.New_Items: Array of new function calls to add to the Proposition.
params.law_project: Id of the law project the caller wants to add a proposition to. The Id is obtained by hashing the Title with the Description of the law project.

Add_Law_Project(address,bytes,bytes).details: Function can be called by a delegation member to submit a new law project. This function put {Law_Initialisation_Price} (see {Law_Project_Parameters} struct of {Delegation_Uils library}) DemoCoin token of Delegation contract in Escrow.

params.Description: Text explaining the spirit and generals goals of the law project. Can be an hash.
params.Title: Title of the law project. Can be an hash.
params.register_address: Address of the register contract the law project is about. Must be contained in Controled_Registers mapping.

Add_Proposal(bytes32,uint256,uint256[],b.details: Function can be called by a delegation member to submit a corpus of function calls propositions to an existing pending law project. This function put in Escrow {FunctionCall_Price} (see {Law_Project_Parameters} struct of {Delegation_Uils library}) DemoCoin token multiplied by the number of function call contained in the proposition.

params.Description: Text to justify the new proposal. Can be an hash.
params.New_Function_Call: List of new function calls added by the caller. For each element of the New_Function_Call array, caller must set a 0 element in {Parent_Proposals_Reuse} array at the index he want the custom function call to be positioned
params.Parent: Proposition Id the caller wants to attach his proposition to. It's the parent proposition in the proposal tree. If there isn't any proposition in the tree we want to attach the new proposition to, we set Parent to 0
params.Parent_Proposals_Reuse: List of Parent's function calls index we want to reuse in the new proposition. Function calls are ordered in the order we want them to be executed. 0 elements correspond to new function calls that have to be added by the caller in {New_Function_Call} argument.
params.law_project: Id of the law project hte caller wants to add a proposition to. The Id is obtained by hashing the Title with the Description of the law project.

Adopt_Law(bytes32).details: If the Law censor period is over and the law project hasn't been rejected by citizens, then any delegation member can call this function to set the law project as ADOPTED (see {Status} enumeration).

params.law_project: Id of the law project the caller wants to add a proposition to. The Id is obtained by hashing the Title with the Description of the law project.

Candidate_Election().details: Function called by a citizen who wish to candidate to next mandate's elections.

Censor_Law(bytes32).details: If we are at the Law censor stage, any citizen can call this function to sign the petition for canceling the law project. If the {Censor_Proposition_Petition_Rate} (see {Law_Project_Parameters} structure) is reached, the law project is aborted.

params.law_project: Id of the law project the caller wants to add a proposition to. The Id is obtained by hashing the Title with the Description of the law project.

Contains(address).details: Allows to check if an account belong to current delegation

params.member_address: address of the account we want to check whether it belongs to current delegation or not.

returns.contain: Boolean indicating whether the account belongs to current delegation or not.

End_Election().details: When voting stage is over, any citizen can call this function to end the election and start a new mandate.

Execute_Law(bytes32,uint256).details: Once the law project has been adopted (ADOPTED value of {Status} enum) then any delegation member can call this function to execute all or some of the remaining function call of the winning proposition.  For the law project to be fully executed all function call have to be executed.

params.law_project: Id of the law project the caller wants to add a proposition to. The Id is obtained by hashing the Title with the Description of the law project.
params.num_function_call_ToExecute: Number of function calls to execute.

New_Election().details: When the current mandate duration is over or if the {New_Election_Petition_Rate} (see {Mandate} struct of {Delegation_Uils} library) is reached, any citizen can call this function to start a new election

Remove_Candidature().details: Function called by a citizen who wish to remove his candidature from next mandate's elections.

Remove_Controled_Register(address).details: Function used to remove the control of a register contract from current delegation.

params.register_address: Address of the register contract that isn't rulable anymore by current delegation

Sign_New_Election_Petition().details: Function can be called by a citizen to sign petition for a new election

Start_Vote(bytes32).details: When the period of proposition submiting is over, any citizen can call this function to start the voting stage. The Id of the ballot corresponding to current law project the IVote contract is computed by hashing {law_project} Id with current block timestamps.

params.law_project: Id of the law project the caller wants to add a proposition to. The Id is obtained by hashing the Title with the Description of the law project.

Update_Internal_Governance(uint256,uint2.details: Change parameters related to the democratic process of Delegation's members election.

params.Election_Duration: Duration of the stage in which citizens are allowed to vote for Candidats they prefer
params.Immunity_Duration: Amount of time after the beginning of a new mandate during which delegation's members can't be revoked
params.Ivote_address: Address of the IVote contract that will be used during election stage
params.New_Election_Petition_Rate: The minimum ratio of citizens required to revoke the current delegation's members and start a new election
params.Num_Max_Members: Maximum number of members in the delegation.
params.Validation_Duration: Duration of the stage in which citizens can validate their hased vote by revealing their choice and the salt that has been used for hasing

Update_Legislatif_Process(uint256[6],uin.details: Change parameters related to the democratic process of registers governance.

params.Censor_Penalty_Rate: Ratio of total amount of token belonged by the delegation that will be lost if a law project is rejected by citizens
params.Censor_Proposition_Petition_Rate: The minimum ratio of citizens required to cancel a law project
params.Ivote_address: Address of the IVote contract that will be used during voting stage
params.Uint256_Legislatifs_Arg: It's an array (We use an array to prevent the "stack to deep error") of uint256 arguments representing respectively:           - Member_Max_Token_Usage: The maximum amount of token a member is allowed to use for a law project elaboration          - Law_Initialisation_Price: The price in token for creating a law project          - FunctionCall_Price: The price in token for one FunctionCall.          - Proposition_Duration: The duration of the stage in which members are allowed to submit propositions          - Vote_Duration: The duration of the stage in which members are allowed to vote for the proposition they want          - Law_Censor_Period_Duration: The duration of the stage in which all citizens are allowed to sign a etition against the law project proposed by the Delegation

userdoc.notice: IDelegation is an interface for contracts that implement a governance system in which a group of elected accounts is allowed to rule one or more controled registers contract.  It allows to implement a repesentativ democracy system in which representatives (delegation members) mandate and decisions can be canceled via direct democracy. Delegation.sol contract is an implementation of this interface. By implementing this interface you can develop your own custom Delegations and plug them into a DAO project via the Constitution contract.
